name: Jacob
description: Son of Isaac, twin of Esau. The supplanter who grabbed his brother's heel, stole the birthright and blessing, then wrestled God and became Israel.

grasping-heel.name: Grasping the Heel
grasping-heel.description: The birth moment - hand grasping Esau's heel
grasping-heel.prompt: newborn or young man's hand grasping another's heel - the defining moment of Jacob's character, refusing to be second even from the womb, determination visible even in infant grip, born competing
grasping-heel.energy: born competitor, second-born refusing second place

offering-soup.name: Offering the Soup
offering-soup.description: Holding bowl of lentils, calculating the trade
offering-soup.prompt: young shepherd holding clay bowl of red lentil stew - calculating expression, one hand on bowl, waiting for hungry brother's desperation, patient opportunist who sees the moment to strike, quiet cunning

wearing-skins.name: The Deception
wearing-skins.description: Disguised in goat skins, approaching blind Isaac
wearing-skins.expression: nervous determination, committed to the con
wearing-skins.prompt: young man with goat skins on arms and neck - approaching elderly blind figure, face showing mix of fear and determination, committed to the deception despite the risk, 'I am Esau your firstborn'

wrestling-angel.name: Wrestling the Angel
wrestling-angel.description: Locked in struggle with divine being until dawn
wrestling-angel.prompt: man locked in wrestling hold with luminous divine figure - muscles straining, face showing absolute refusal to let go, hip out of joint but still fighting, the struggle that lasted until dawn, becoming Israel through combat

demanding-blessing.name: Demanding the Blessing
demanding-blessing.description: Gripping the angel, refusing to release without blessing
demanding-blessing.expression: desperate determination, will not be denied
demanding-blessing.prompt: man gripping divine figure with desperate strength - face showing absolute determination, 'I will not let you go unless you bless me', demanding what he wants through sheer persistence, the ultimate negotiator

renamed-israel.name: Becoming Israel
renamed-israel.description: The moment of transformation - limping but victorious
renamed-israel.prompt: man at dawn limping but standing tall - touched hip causing limp, face showing exhausted triumph, no longer Jacob the supplanter but Israel who strove with God, transformation through struggle, new name earned

rivalry-birthright-bargain.name: Rivalry: Birthright Bargain
rivalry-birthright-bargain.description: Jacob in rivalry scene: A rugged, outdoor landscape. The sun is setting, casting long shadows. A small, makeshift camp with a fire burning low.
rivalry-birthright-bargain.prompt: Jacob is seated near a cooking pot, stirring a stew with a sly grin. He extends a bowl towards the viewer, one hand gesturing in a bargaining manner. He wears simple, practical clothing.

rivalry-stolen-blessing.name: Rivalry: Stolen Blessing
rivalry-stolen-blessing.description: Jacob in rivalry scene: The interior of Isaac's tent, dimly lit by oil lamps. The atmosphere is thick with tension and deception.
rivalry-stolen-blessing.prompt: Jacob kneels before his blind father, Isaac. He is dressed in Esau's clothes and covered in animal skin on his hands and neck. His expression is nervous, but determined as he bows his head.

rivalry-the-reunion.name: Rivalry: The Reunion
rivalry-the-reunion.description: Jacob in rivalry scene: A vast, open plain, with the setting sun casting long shadows. A sense of anticipation and unease fills the air.
rivalry-the-reunion.prompt: Jacob bows low to the ground, surrounded by his wives and children. He extends his hands in a gesture of supplication, his face etched with anxiety.
